title: De Soto National Memorial: Social Media
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations     Social Media                De Soto National Memorial Social Media          De Soto National Memorial has a page on Facebook you can "like." Here, you will be able to share with us and others your experiences at De Soto. Sometimes we'll ask questions that make you think about your time in De Soto, or we'll further engage you in ongoing park Special Events so your voice can be heard. We'll also share the latest park news, post photos, videos, and highlight current conditions when possible.  Â      De Soto YAC Facebook Page   De Soto National Memorial Youth Advisory Council's Facebook Page. If you are a member of De Soto National Memorial's YAC join the discussion on their official Facebook Page by clicking here.
